title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and attends a magical school.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description: The second year at the magical school with new challenges for the young wizard.

title: The Hobbit
description: A hobbit embarks on a journey with dwarves to reclaim treasure guarded by a dragon.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Fellowship of the Ring
description: The quest to destroy a powerful ring with the fellowship across Middle-earth.

title: The Silmarillion
description: A collection of mythopoeic stories about the history of Middle-earth.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A classic romance that explores manners, marriage, and morality in 19th-century England.

title: Sense and Sensibility
description: A story of love, romance, and societal expectations in England.

title: Emma
description: A tale of a young woman navigating love and society in England.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A story of racial injustice and childhood in the Deep South.

title: Go Set a Watchman
description: The continuation of the story of Scout and her life in the South.
A dystopian society under constant surveillance by a totalitarian regime.

title: Animal Farm
description: An allegorical novella reflecting events leading up to the Russian Revolution.

title: Brave New World
description: A dystopian society where technology controls society and individuality is lost.

title: Fahrenheit 451
description: A society where books are banned, and firemen burn any that are found.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
description: A young man narrates his experiences in New York after being expelled from school.

title: Great Expectations
description: The growth and personal development of an orphan named Pip.

title: Oliver Twist
description: The adventures of an orphan in the underworld of London.

title: Moby Dick
description: A sailor's obsessive quest for revenge on a giant whale.

title: The Old Man and The Sea
description: An aging fisherman struggles with a giant marlin far out in the Gulf Stream.

title: The Great Gatsby
description: A mysterious millionaire's passion and obsession in 1920s America.
